name: A Light Against Darkness
description:
Willow was walking at night at the florest when fell into a strange cave. The water cushioned her fall, but it was impossible to retreat the way she came. The only option is to explore the cave and try to find some way out.

Without weapons or equipments, the only thing she has to defend herself is a little torch and your help, traveler! Will you assist Willow in her way back home? Can she return before supper?

It's a short top down game made for Godot Wild Jam #45. It has an Achievement system, keybinds, settings menu, level select, five enemies, five levels and two endings!

Controls*:

WASD for Move

Mouse to Look

P for Pause

Space for Attack with your torch

*You can change it in the menu.
